name: Abandoned Mansion
description: A once-grand mansion now shrouded in mystery. The dusty halls hold secrets waiting to be uncovered.

objects.name: Old Painting
objects.description: A portrait of the mansion's former owner. The eyes seem to follow you...
objects.revealsClue: The painting's frame has numbers etched along the edge: 1847

objects.name: Brass Key
objects.description: An ornate brass key with intricate engravings. It looks important.
objects.revealsClue: This key opens the desk drawer

objects.name: Mahogany Desk
objects.description: An elegant mahogany desk with a locked drawer. You need a key to open it.
objects.revealsClue: Inside the drawer is a cryptic note and a silver locket

objects.name: Crystal Ball
objects.description: A mysterious crystal ball that seems to glow with inner light.
objects.revealsClue: The crystal shows visions of hidden passages

objects.name: Grandfather Clock
objects.description: An imposing grandfather clock that stopped at 11:47. The pendulum is still.
objects.revealsClue: The clock face hides a secret compartment behind the 12

puzzles.title: Library Safe
puzzles.description: Enter the 4-digit code to unlock the safe
hints: Look around the room for numbers that might be significant
The old painting holds more secrets than just a face
Check the frame of the portrait - numbers are etched there: 1847
puzzles.rewardText: You found the mansion's deed and a map of secret passages!

puzzles.title: Silver Locket
puzzles.description: Arrange the symbols to match the pattern shown in the locket
hints: The locket contains four symbols in a specific order
Look at the engravings inside the locket carefully
The correct order is: Moon, Star, Sun, Key
puzzles.rewardText: The locket opens to reveal a hidden message about the mansion's treasure!

name: Secret Laboratory
description: A high-tech laboratory hidden beneath the city. Something went wrong here...

objects.name: Glowing Test Tube
objects.description: A test tube filled with a mysterious glowing substance.
objects.revealsClue: The substance reacts to certain electromagnetic frequencies

objects.name: Computer Terminal
objects.description: A high-tech computer terminal with multiple screens and blinking lights.
objects.revealsClue: Access logs show experiments conducted at specific times

objects.name: Frequency Generator
objects.description: A device that generates electromagnetic frequencies. Currently inactive.
objects.revealsClue: When activated with the right substance, it opens sealed doors

objects.name: Research Notes
objects.description: Scattered research notes with complex formulas and diagrams.
objects.revealsClue: The notes mention a sequence: 7394 - the emergency override code

puzzles.title: Emergency Override
puzzles.description: Enter the emergency override code to unlock the lab exit
hints: Check the research notes for important numbers
The scientists would have had an emergency protocol
The research notes mention an emergency override: 7394
puzzles.rewardText: Emergency systems activated! The exit is now unlocked.

puzzles.title: Frequency Calibration
puzzles.description: Match the frequency pattern to activate the generator
hints: The frequency pattern is based on musical notes
Look for clues about sound waves in the lab equipment
The sequence follows A4, C5, E5, G5 frequencies: 440, 523, 659, 784 Hz
puzzles.rewardText: The frequency generator activates, opening the sealed chamber!

name: Pirate Ship
description: Captain Blackbeard's legendary ship. The treasure is close, but the ship holds many secrets.

objects.name: Treasure Map
objects.description: A weathered map showing the location of Blackbeard's treasure.
objects.revealsClue: X marks the spot, but you need the captain's compass to read it properly

objects.name: Captain's Compass
objects.description: A golden compass that belonged to the ship's captain.
objects.revealsClue: The compass points to true magnetic north and reveals hidden markings on maps

objects.name: Ship's Cannon
objects.description: A massive cannon aimed at the horizon. Something is stuck in the barrel.
objects.revealsClue: There's a message in a bottle lodged in the cannon barrel

objects.name: Ship's Wheel
objects.description: The captain's wheel with intricate rope work and brass fittings.
objects.revealsClue: The wheel can be turned to reveal hidden compartments

objects.name: Rum Barrel
objects.description: A large barrel that once held the finest Caribbean rum.
objects.revealsClue: The barrel is hollow and contains a hidden key

puzzles.title: Treasure Location
puzzles.description: Use the map and compass to find the treasure coordinates
hints: Combine the treasure map with the captain's compass
Look for coordinate markings that become visible
The compass reveals the coordinates: X=12, Y=34
puzzles.rewardText: You've found the treasure location! The chest is yours!

puzzles.title: Captain's Riddle
puzzles.description: Solve the riddle hidden in the message bottle
puzzles.riddle: I keep the ship from drifting away, heavy and strong both night and day. What am I?
hints: Think about what keeps a ship in place
It's heavy and prevents the ship from moving
puzzles.rewardText: The anchor compartment opens, revealing the captain's personal treasure!
